languages.text: {n}Соломон бледнеет. На его виске вздувается жила, и вы явственно слышите скрип зубов.{/n} "Трогать моего пса было большой ошибкой".
{n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон бледнеет. На его виске вздувается жила, и вы явственно слышите скрип зубов.{/n} "Трогать моего пса было большой ошибкой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."
{n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."

{n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."
{n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wird aschfahl. Eine Ader pulsiert an seiner Schläfe und du kannst hören, wie er mit den Zähnen knirscht.{/n} "Meinen Hund anzufassen, war ein schwerer Fehler."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne wird aschfahl. Eine Ader pulsiert an seiner Schläfe und du kannst hören, wie er mit den Zähnen knirscht."Meinen Hund anzufassen, war ein schwerer Fehler."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne pâlit. Une veine pulse au niveau de sa tempe et vous l'entendez distinctement grincer des dents.{/n} « Vous avez fait une grave erreur en touchant mon chien. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne pâlit. Une veine pulse au niveau de sa tempe et vous l'entendez distinctement grincer des dents.{/n} « Vous avez fait une grave erreur en touchant mon chien. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙脸色发白，太阳穴的血管疯狂地抽搐着。你清楚地听到了他磨牙的声音。{/n}“你动了我的狗，这真是个天大的错误。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙脸色发白，太阳穴的血管疯狂地抽搐着。你清楚地听到了他磨牙的声音。{/n}“你动了我的狗，这真是个天大的错误。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se queda lívido. Una vena palpita en su sien y oyes con claridad cómo rechinan sus dientes.{/n} «Nunca deberían haber tocado a mi perro».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se queda lívido. Una vena palpita en su sien y oyes con claridad cómo rechinan sus dientes.{/n} «Nunca deberían haber tocado a mi perro».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの顔が青ざめ、こめかみに血管が浮かび上がる。歯ぎしりの音がはっきりと聞こえた。{/n}「私の犬に手を出したのは、大きな間違いでしたね」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの顔が青ざめ、こめかみに血管が浮かび上がる。歯ぎしりの音がはっきりと聞こえた。{/n}「私の犬に手を出したのは、大きな間違いでしたね」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un rengi atıyor. Şakağında bir damar belirginleşiyor. Dişlerini gıcırdattığını duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Köpeğime dokunmayacaktınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pales. A vein throbs at his temple, and you can clearly hear his teeth grinding.{/n} "Touching my dog was a big mistake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un rengi atıyor. Şakağında bir damar belirginleşiyor. Dişlerini gıcırdattığını duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Köpeğime dokunmayacaktınız."
